禄を食む: (ろくをはむ) - to get a salary (from); to receive a stipend (from); to be on the payroll (of)
禄高: (ろくだか) - (amount of a samurai's) stipend
禅味: (ぜんみ) - the flavor of Zen; the flavour of Zen; air or style of disinterestedness
禅問答: (ぜんもんどう) - Zen dialogue; Zen questions and answers
禅学: (ぜんがく) - Zen studies; Zen practice
禅宗様: (ぜんしゅうよう) - traditional Zen-style architecture
禅定: (ぜんじょう) - dhyana-samadhi (meditative concentration); ascetic practice atop a sacred mountain (in Shugendou); mountain top
禅室: (ぜんしつ) - room for zazen meditation/room for Buddhist practices; Zen monk's quarters; head priest (of a Zen temple)
禅家: (ぜんけ) - Zen; Zen temple; Zen priest
禅師: (ぜんし) - monk; priest, particularly a high-ranking Zen monk honored by the imperial court
禅智: (ぜんち) - wisdom obtained from meditation; wisdom and meditation
禅法: (ぜんぼう) - method of Buddhist study and practice that is based in meditative concentration; meditative methods used in Zen Buddhism
禅浄: (ぜんじょう) - (from 禅宗 and 浄土宗) Zen Buddhism and Pure Land Buddhism
禅知: (ぜんち) - wisdom obtained from meditation; wisdom and meditation
禅譲: (ぜんじょう) - (historical, in China) abdication by an emperor in favor (favour) of a more virtuous successor
禅道: (ぜんどう) - Zen ascetic practices/Zen meditation; Zen teachings/Zen
禅門: (ぜんもん) - Zen; entering the path of Zen
禊教: (みそぎきょう) - Misogi-kyo (sect of Shinto)
禊祓: (みそぎはらえ) - form of Shinto purification
禊萩: (ミゾハギ) - Lythrum anceps (species of loosestrife closely related to purple loosestrife, Lythrum salicaria)
禍々しい: (magamagashii) - ominoso, sinistro, azarado, de mau presságio
禍の府: (わざわいのふ) - sink of iniquity
禍を転じて福となす: (わざわいをてんじてふくとなす) - to turn misfortune into fortune (esp. through one's own efforts); to turn the potential disaster to one's advantage
禍を転じて福と為す: (わざわいをてんじてふくとなす) - to turn misfortune into fortune (esp. through one's own efforts); to turn the potential disaster to one's advantage
禍事: (まがこと) - (esp. 禍言) ominous word/ill-omened word; (esp. 禍事) misfortune
禍根: (kakon) - raiz do mal, fonte do mal
禍根を残す: (かこんをのこす) - to create a breeding ground for future problems; to turn a blind eye to future trouble; to allow for something to come back and bite one in the ass (in the future)
禍根を絶つ: (かこんをたつ) - to strike at the root of an evil
禍津日神: (まがついのかみ) - evil gods (who cause sin, etc.)
禍禍しい: (まがまがしい) - ominous/sinister/unlucky/ill-omened; annoying; appearing to be true
禍福: (かふく) - fortune and misfortune; prosperity and adversity; good and evil; weal and woe
禍福はあざなえる縄のごとし: (かふくはあざなえるなわのごとし) - fortune and misfortune are intertwined; fortune and misfortune come by turns; good luck and bad luck alternate (like the strands of a rope); good and bad fortune are next-door neighbours
禍福はあざなえる縄の如し: (かふくはあざなえるなわのごとし) - fortune and misfortune are intertwined; fortune and misfortune come by turns; good luck and bad luck alternate (like the strands of a rope); good and bad fortune are next-door neighbours
禍福は糾える縄のごとし: (かふくはあざなえるなわのごとし) - fortune and misfortune are intertwined; fortune and misfortune come by turns; good luck and bad luck alternate (like the strands of a rope); good and bad fortune are next-door neighbours
禍福は糾える縄の如し: (かふくはあざなえるなわのごとし) - fortune and misfortune are intertwined; fortune and misfortune come by turns; good luck and bad luck alternate (like the strands of a rope); good and bad fortune are next-door neighbours
禍福得喪: (かふくとくそう) - calamity, good fortune, success and failure
禍言: (まがこと) - (esp. 禍言) ominous word/ill-omened word; (esp. 禍事) misfortune
禍転じて福となす: (わざわいてんじてふくとなす) - to turn misfortune into fortune (esp. through one's own efforts); to turn the potential disaster to one's advantage
禍転じて福と為す: (わざわいてんじてふくとなす) - to turn misfortune into fortune (esp. through one's own efforts); to turn the potential disaster to one's advantage
福の神: (ふくのかみ) - god of fortune; god of wealth
福利厚生: (ふくりこうせい) - welfare program; welfare programme
福利厚生費: (ふくりこうせいひ) - welfare expense
福利表: (ふくりひょう) - compound interest table
福助: (ふくすけ) - large-headed dwarf statue, bringer of good luck
福寿: (ふくじゅ) - long life and happiness
福寿草: (フクジュソウ) - pheasant's eye (species of buttercup, Adonis ramosa)
福島県: (ふくしまけん) - Fukushima prefecture (Tohoku area)
福建土楼: (ふっけんどろう) - type of circular or square earth building built from the 12th century in Fujian, China
福徳: (ふくとく) - fortune; happiness and prosperity
福徳円満: (ふくとくえんまん) - (yoji) being perfectly happy and prosperous; wealth and happiness
福楽: (ふくらく) - happiness and comfort; happiness and peace
福祉: (fukushi) - bem-estar, bem-estar social, assistência social, seguridade social, serviço social
福祉事務所: (ふくしじむしょ) - welfare office; social security office
福祉商法: (ふくししょうほう) - (yoji) (unscrupulous) business practices based on an appeal to one's social conscience; (unscrupulous) sales methods used by someone falsely claiming to represent a charitable (social welfare) organization
福祉心理学: (ふくししんりがく) - psychology for human services
福祉政策: (ふくしせいさく) - welfare policy; social welfare measures
福祉施設: (ふくししせつ) - welfare institution; welfare facility
福祉機器: (ふくしきき) - assistive products (e.g. wheel chairs, hearing aids, etc.)
福祉車両: (ふくししゃりょう) - vehicle for disabled persons; assistive vehicle
